item.title: Why dosent my server auto ban like its supposed to?
item.dc:creator: @6aceofspades 6aceofspades
item.description:
@6aceofspades wrote:

Well then you would need to make an else if statement, all and else statement is doing is well in this case nothing since you “elsed” a command… the “else” of a command is erm… nothing… I think. (Sorry if that doesn’t make sense lol, it did to me in my head. xD)
Try this…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights == 1) { if (absY <= 9999) { } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights <=0) { removeAllItems(); ApplyDead(); uberentangle(); disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just been banned for noclipping!"); sendMessage("Banned!"); }
Sorry this isn’t tested I just edited the code you placed, but it’s worth a try. It SHOULD work…

-Justin

P.S. Why a ban? A bit harsh don’t you think? Just give em a kick, maybe just empty out their inventory and they will learn next time.

Read full topic

item.title: Why dosent my server auto ban like its supposed to?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Why do you need all that other stuff…

just make it else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }
